remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合对象 ( ) 通过访问控件的属性。The collection of objects (the ) is accessed through the control's property. 控件将自动创建一系列为你在设置时的对象属性设置为适当的数据源。The control automatically creates a collection of objects for you when you set the property to an appropriate data source. 创建的对象实际上是继承的以下类之一的实例:或类。The objects created actually are instances of one of the following classes that inherit from : or class. 若要设置格式的数据显示，请设置属性的类格式设置的值之一。To format the data display, set the property of the class to one of the formatting values. 有关有效格式设置的值的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid formatting values, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 此外可以创建您自己的集对象，并将其添加到。You can also create your own set of objects and add them to the . 执行此操作时，必须设置的每个列样式应用到的与实际数据同步显示列的显示。When you do so, you must set the of each column style to the of a to synchronize the display of columns with the actual data. > [!CAUTION] > 始终创建对象，并将其添加到添加之前对象添加到。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 当添加一个空使用一个有效值到集合中，为你自动生成的对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常具有重复的对象值到。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 当派生类的一个由实例化控件，创建的类取决于的与关联对象。When one of the derived classes is instantiated by a control, the class created depends on the of the associated with the object. 例如，使用其设置为`System.Boolean`将关联的。For example, a with its set to `System.Boolean` will be associated with a . 若要确定类型为 any ，使用方法。To determine the type of any , use the method. 若要创建您自己的列类，可以继承自。To create your own column classes, you can inherit from . 你可能想要执行此操作以创建托管控件的特殊列即为例证通过类，哪些主机控件。You might want to do this in order to create special columns that host controls, as exemplified by the class, which hosts the control. 例如，你可以托管控件以显示图片中的列，或在列中，可以创建自己的用户控件来承载。For example, you can host an control to show pictures in columns, or you can create your own user control to host in the column. 功能不应混淆与。The functionality of the shouldn't be confused with that of the . 而包含的属性和方法适用于创建数据表的架构包含的属性和方法与在屏幕上的单个列的外观。Whereas the contains the properties and methods appropriate to creating a data table's schema, the contains the properties and methods related to the appearance of an individual column on the screen. 如果行包含，可以用来设置列中显示的文本属性。If a row contains a , the text displayed in the column can be set with the property. 类还允许您指定的列的行为，而正在更改其数据。The class also allows you to specify the behavior of a column while its data is being changed. 和方法对列的数据进行大量更新时暂时挂起列的绘制。The and methods temporarily suspend the drawing of the column while large updates are being made to the column's data. 如果没有此功能，在每个单元格网格的每次更改会立即绘制;这可能是对用户和性能责任让人分散注意力。Without this functionality, every change in every cell of the grid would be immediately drawn; this could be distracting to the user and a performance liability. 几种方法允许用户编辑的列的监视包括和事件。Several methods allow monitoring of the column as it is edited by the user, including the and events. 大多数属性和类的方法适用于控制列的外观。Most of the properties and methods of the class are tailored to controlling a column's appearance. 但一些，例如和，可以检查和更改中指定的单元格的值。But a few, such as the and allow you to examine and change the value in a specified cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建承载控件。The following code example creates a that hosts a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当多个更改的外观控件 （所做的更改是否由控件显示的数据列的属性中），应调用方法来暂时冻结控件的绘制。When many changes are made to the appearance of a control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control. 这会导致分散注意力到该用户，并且提高性能。This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain. 在进行所有更新后，调用方法恢复绘制的控件。After all updates have been made, invoke the method to resume drawing of the control.
